subject: Add hard rules, quality gates, and coding standards to CLAUDE.md
body:
Integrate missing coding standards from reference template:
- Hard Rules section (checklist format) at top: before-making-changes,
  best practices, cleanup, quality checks
- Expanded Principle 1 with concrete UX enforcement (good/bad examples)
- Expanded Principle 3 with alternatives-considered comment requirements
- Code Organization subsection with file/function size limits
- Testing requirements section
- Explicit Prohibitions list
